mapper.sql: a.questionnaireId AS "questionnaireId", a.room AS "room", a.name AS "name", a.inspector AS "inspector", a.question1 AS "question1", a.question2 AS "question2", a.question3 AS "question3", a.question4 AS "question4", a.question5 AS "question5", a.question6 AS "question6", a.remark AS "remark", a.create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM a_questionnaire a
AND (a.room LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%') OR a.name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%') OR a.inspector LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%'))
ORDER BY a.questionnaireId DESC
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO a_questionnaire( room, name, inspector, question1, question2, question3, question4, question5, question6, remark, create_time ) VALUES ( #{room}, #{name}, #{inspector}, #{question1}, #{question2}, #{question3}, #{question4}, #{question5}, #{question6}, #{remark}, #{createTime} )
